article_title: FTC Seeks More Information On Walgreens-Rite Aid Deal

article_metadata.description: Walgreens Boots Alliance said the Federal Trade Commission last month asked for “additional information” from Rite Aid and Walgreens, but described the agency’s request as “expected” amid a period of rampant consolidation in the U.S. healthcare industry. Walgreens updated Wall Street analysts during the company’s first quarter earnings call on the global [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
